text: Hot Shots Golf 3, also known in Japan as , is a sport video game exclusive for PlayStation 2. This is the first Hot Shots Golf series was not released in Europe and Australia. ==Trivia== A bonus golfer in North American version was John Daly will be unlocked, after beating the game. ==Other websites== Category:2001 video games Category:Golf video games Category:Hot Shots Golf Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Sports video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Hot Shots Golf 3
